name: Pixel Art Monster - Color by Number
developer: Pixel Art Monster - Color by Number
publisher: Pixel Art Monster - Color by Number
description: Pixel Art Monster - Color by Number is an addictive anti-stress pixel art game. Choose from a variety of fun pixel images and follow the numbers to bring them to life. Pixel Coloring has never been this easy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 70 MB available space
